tool_description:
The listed REST API calls give you access to the entire Onehop Platform stack. 
These API calls are designed to make it easy to add a rich in-app messaging feature to your application.
name: Onehop SMS
title: Onehop SMS

api_list.name: SMS Credits Information
api_list.description: This API will return credit information for each Product you have in product Inventory. currency_code is the base currency for credit deduction and information for each product.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://soham-d94-onehop-v1.p.rapidapi.com/v1/credits/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "soham-d94-onehop-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://soham-d94-onehop-v1.p.rapidapi.com/v1/credits/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "soham-d94-onehop-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
